name: Exposing Key IDC Hubs
description: Mapping the core operational hubs that sustain IDC influence, including financial, governmental, and intelligence strongholds.

cards.title: Locating Financial Nerve Centers
cards.description: Identifying the banking and investment networks that fuel IDC operations worldwide.
bulletpoints: Tracing elite banking institutions with ties to IDC money laundering.
Uncovering shell corporations and financial black holes.
Mapping high-level banking executives with ties to global control structures.

cards.title: Government and Intelligence Agency Infiltration
cards.description: Exposing the key government and intelligence agencies used as tools for IDC agendas.
bulletpoints: Identifying compromised officials and intelligence assets.
Tracking policy influence and law manipulation for elite control.
Analyzing geopolitical strategies tied to IDC power structures.

cards.title: Tracking Media and Social Engineering Centers
cards.description: Mapping out the corporate media strongholds used for propaganda and social control.
bulletpoints: Identifying elite-controlled media conglomerates and ownership structures.
Decoding psychological manipulation tactics in mass media.
Tracking media disinformation campaigns designed to protect IDC power centers.
